titles.title: To authorize the carrying out of a flood damage reduction and recreation project at Grand Forks, North Dakota, and East Grand Forks, Minnesota.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: 10/11/1998--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to carry out a flood damage reduction and recreation project at Grand Forks, North Dakota, and East Grand Forks, Minnesota, substantially in accordance with the plans and subject to the conditions recommended in a final report of the Chief of Engineers, as approved by the Secretary.
